description: Submission of details pursuant to Conditions 1.8 (Temporary Works) comprising construction of temporary parking area, footway and associated works serving the Southern Development (including but not limited to the Exploratory Park, Visitor Centre and Claremont Park within Phase 1B (South)) situated on land between Tempelhof Avenue and the Brent Cross Exploratory Park, widening of existing traffic island located on approach road to Brent South Retail Park roundabout; and Condition 1.8A relating to hoarding and fencing types within the construction site, pursuant to planning permission F/04687/13 dated 23/07/2014 for the comprehensive redevelopment of Brent Cross Cricklewood
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
